sqlMap.update: UPDATE USER_INFO SET USERNAME = #username# , PASSWORD = #password# , BIRTH_DATE = #birthDate# , SEX = #sex# , AGE = #age# WHERE USER_ID = #userId#

SELECT /* UserInfo.getById */ USER_ID ,USERNAME ,PASSWORD ,BIRTH_DATE ,SEX ,AGE
